label: Spaced Repetition
description: Reviewing material at increasing intervals to improve long-term retention.

label: Active Recall
description: Testing oneself to retrieve information from memory rather than rereading.

label: Interleaving
description: Mixing different topics or problem types during study sessions to strengthen connections.

label: Elaboration
description: Explaining and describing ideas in detail to deepen understanding.

label: Self-Explanation
description: Talking through your own reasoning process while solving a problem.
